author: clar
msg: Removing bb proposal since it will require a major number bump

author: joes
msg: Add FAQ file to distribution and fix maintainer-mode logic: USE_MAINTAINER_MODE is either 'yes' or 'no'.

author: joes
msg: Replace doxygen.conf with doxygen.conf.in (so version numbers will correctly appear in docs).  Add custom header/footer/css files to generate docs suitable for posting on the apreq website.

author: wrowe
msg: Fix the rewrite_map program invocation for Win32.  Someone borrowed
the pass-environ[][] construct from unix, but CreateProcess is much
happier to copy the current environment when passed NULL for the
flat environment strings argument (properly formatted, that argument
must be null or a string in the format "var1=val\0var2=val\0\0".)
The only other CreateProcess call which does *not* pass NULL for
the envvars arg, in util_script.c for cgi, does the right thing
